title: nf-core/scnanoseq pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input. Supports both long-read (single-end) and short-read (paired-end) formats.

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq.errorMessage: FastQ file for long-read (single-end) must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq', '.fastq', '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file R1 (barcode/UMI) for short-read (paired-end) must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq', '.fastq', '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file R2 (transcript) for short-read (paired-end) must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq', '.fastq', '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

oneOf.description: Short-read format: requires fastq_1 and fastq_2 (paired-end)
